markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Titan Wrestler](/Feats.aspx?ID=854) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 268 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You can attempt to Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip creatures up to two sizes larger than you, or up to three sizes larger than you if you’re legendary in Athletics.

<title level="2">Titan Wrestler leads to...</title>
[The Harder They Fall (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3901)
name: Titan Wrestler
